name: Association Belge de recherche et d'expertise des organisations de consommateurs
goal: Soutien des organisations de consommateurs en leur offrant un plateform d'echange d'information. Elaboration des études concernant les consommateurs et la consommation. Réprésentation des consommateurs dans des différents commission d'avis.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Audiovisual and Media, Consumer Affairs, Development, Economic and Financial Affairs, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Fisheries and Aquaculture, Food Safety, General and Institutional Affairs, Information Society, Internal Market, Public Health, Research and Technology, Trade, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: consumer law, food safety, safety of consumer products, debt of households and protection against indebtness, energy,  empowerment of consumer organisations
